ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: and glorify Him in the morning and the evening.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And sing His praises morning and evening.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and glorify Him morning and evening.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: and glorify Him both in the mornings and in the evenings.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And proclaim His Purity, morning and evening.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And glorify His praises morning and Asila.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And glorify Him morning and evening.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and give Him glory at the dawn and in the evening.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And glorify Him early and late.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And hallow Him morning and evening.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and glorify Him morning and evening.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And glorify Him morning and evening.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And glorify His Praises morning and afternoon [the early morning (Fajr) and 'Asr prayers].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: exalt Him at dawn and in the evening.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And glorify Him morning and evening.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And exalt Him morning and afternoon.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [33:42] And glorify Him morning and evening, in other words, at the beginning of the day and at the end of it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And glorify Him early and late) and pray for Him in the morning and evening.
